item.title: Pokemon TCG Shares Top Decks from World Championships 2025
item.description:
The Pokemon Trading Card Game is showcasing the top decks being played at the 2025 Pokemon World Championships, featuring some truly fearsome strategies taking over the tournament. The massively popular trading card game has been abuzz with excitement as the multimedia monster-catching franchise is hosting its biggest competitive event of the year. The annual competition features top-level tournaments for games like the main-series Pokemon video games, Pokemon TCG , and Pokemon GO alongside smaller competitions for other Pokemon games. Now, Pokemon is highlighting some of the best decks in the trading card game.

The card game branch of the beloved franchise has seen plenty of powerful decks emerge throughout the Scarlet and Violet era, based around some fan-favorite creatures. Decks like "Gardevoir ex" and "Charizard ex" have been mainstays of the meta since early on in the game's current era, frequently capturing high finishes at competitive events. The recent Standard format rotation in April has also allowed some other decks to thrive, with strategies centered around "Gholdengo ex" and "Raging Bolt ex" seeing success. Now, the best of the best are on display at the Pokemon World Championships.

The Pokemon Company shared a breakdown of the top decks at the Pokemon TCG World Championships on its official social media accounts, detailing which decks are thriving in the tournament. Gholdengo ex has easily been the darling of the tournament in terms of representation, seeing a 29.9% playrate with 38 different players. Two other decks boast playrates above 10% of the tournament's playerbase, with "Dragapult ex/Dusknoir" and "Raging Bolt ex/Teal Mask Ogerpon ex" seeing 16.5% and 12.6% pick rates, respectively. Gardevoir ex stands as the only other deck with more than 10 players, sitting at a 9.4% playrate with 12 picks.

Pokemon TCG Reveals Top Decks at 2025 Worlds

  • Gholdengo ex : 29.9% play rate, 38 picks
  • Dragapult ex/Dusknoir : 16.5% play rate, 21 picks
  • Raging Bolt ex/Teal Mask Ogerpon ex : 12.6% play rate, 16 picks
  • Gardevoir ex : 9.4% play rate, 12 picks
  • Charizard ex/Pidgeot ex : 4.7% play rate, 6 picks
  • Dragapult ex/Munkidori : 4.7% play rate, 6 picks

The spread of decks represented at the World Championships features plenty of the perceived best decks in the Standard format. Gholdengo's "Make It Rain" attack is a powerful tool for dishing out quick KOs, especially when paired with the new "Genesect ex" from the recent Black Bolt expansion. Dragapult ex's "Phantom Dive" Attack allows it to excel at dismantling an opponent's Bench, while Raging Bolt ex boasts similar high-damage potential to Gholdengo for quickly taking Prize Cards.

The Pokemon World Championships serve as a fitting conclusion for the Scarlet and Violet era, with the next evolution of the TCG on the way. September will welcome the launch of "Mega Evolution" to kick off the next era of the card game, officially seeing the return of Mega Pokemon to the Pokemon Trading Card Game . The Pokemon Company has confirmed that the set will feature 10 different Mega Pokemon, including powerful cards like "Mega Gardevoir ex" and "Mega Lucario ex" among others. The next era of the Pokemon TCG is on the way soon, with lots of exciting changes to come.

item.title: Fortnite: Best Tycoon Maps (2025)
item.description:
Fortnite has developed a grand community within its Creative mode section of the free-to-play game. Harboring a large number of creators and players, Creative mode can introduce various genres of maps for all types of gamers. Tycoon maps, some of the most popular types of Creative games, take up a large part of the Creative Directory.

There are many exceptional tycoon-esque maps that players can find in Fortnite . These maps start their players off at the beginning of a 'career' with no money or assets. Eventually, after garnering more and more gold over time, players can purchase more objects, exploits, structures, and more to increase their tycoon level.

Updated August 16, 2025, by Ashely Claudino: Tycoon maps are some of the most popular games in Fortnite Creative, as it's easy to lose track of time as you continue to progress into whatever it is gamers are managing. Hundreds of fun Fortnite Creative islands are uploaded every day, so it's worth checking out the Discovery tab from time to time and seeing what's new. Since this list was published, several islands have been introduced to the game or updated with more content, which is why they're definitely worth checking out. This article has been updated as well and now contains more entries on exciting islands that are worth gamers' time.

Banana Tycoon

5264-4775-4768

  • Players: 4
  • Creator: bojock

Banana Tycoon isn't just one of the most popular tycoon games in Fortnite's Creative Directory, but also one of the most well-made tycoons ever. Banana Tycoon allows players to start from the bottom of the barrel with no money at all, but some bananas to help start them out.

While producing more and more bananas, players can eventually unlock money generators to help speed up the process. Over time, fans will have a large banana factory and resort. Playing Banana Tycoon also unveils tons of AFK XP, as well as XP earned from performing specific actions.

Squid Game Tycoon

5655-2869-7519

Fortnite players who enjoy playing tycoon Creative Islands and like the show Squid Game can now combine the two, thanks to Squid Game Tycoon, an awesome map that allows players to build their own compound for the games. Players will need to increase their funds so they can upgrade the compound and acquire the necessary equipment to get the show up and running.

The NPCs resemble the guards in the show, there are minigames that are just like the ones seen on the show, including Red Light Green Light, and the unlockables are Squid Game -themed. It is the typical tycoon game, but it has a Squid Game twist to it that will certainly appeal to its fans.

Miner Tycoon

4781-1197-6847

  • Players: 8
  • Creator: blzn

Gamers who enjoy Lumberjack Heroes, one of the most known Tycoon games in Fortnite Creative, will certainly enjoy Miner Tycoon in Fortnite . In this Creative map, gamers will work in a quarry where they will continuously mine rocks in order to unlock upgrades and increase their rock-mining efficiency.

As they continue to work hard in this game mode, gamers' pickaxes will grow stronger, meaning they will be able to harvest a larger amount of rocks with just one swing. They must continue to work hard to get more pets and upgrade their capabilities to become the best miners in Fortnite .

Infinity Tower Tycoon

6586-8735-3733

In Infinity Tower Tycoon, players will have to make money so they can upgrade their tower and turn it into the tallest building in the vicinity. Players can farm money and gold by purchasing upgrades, grabbing collectibles, in a secret dimension by slaying zombies, and completing parkour challenges. As their earnings increase, players will be able to greatly expand their tower and add all sorts of features to it.

Gamers who are looking for a fun tycoon to play but also want to level up their Fortnite account, then Infinity Tower Tycoon is the right game for them, as they can hit the money for XP while idling but they can also jump into the zombie minigame and farm kills; taking down a handful of husks will grant players thousands of experience points.

Skybox Tycoon

1254-1353-2484

  • Players: 4
  • Creator: grafiese

Skybox Tycoon takes clear inspiration from one very popular title: Minecraft. In Skybox Tycoon, players will craft their way through a cubed world while earning money and investing in various resources that they can sell off.

Throughout this Minecraft -like world, players can wander around and complete quests, as well as find pets to adopt along the journey. Skybox Tycoon lets players build various workstations to utilize in their world, which can boost the amount of currency earned over time.

Cars Tycoon

2844-7565-5598

  • Players: 6
  • Creator: brawlstudio

Car fanatics will certainly get a kick out of this Creative map, as players can access many different cars while creating their dream mansion. Cars Tycoon starts players off with the weakest car(s), but once they have invested in their mansion and tycoon, they will be able to purchase better cars to drive around with, as well as simply have them on display.

There are also many pets that players can collect throughout Cars Tycoon, all of which follow them around the map. The models (and map entirely) all look incredible, using Unreal Engine 5 to make the game all the better.

Rocket Tycoon

6135-9407-7933

  • Players: 4
  • Creator: thegirlsstudio

This Creative Map allows fans of space exploration to let their imagination run free, as they will be able to travel between planets and fight against aliens. In Rocket Tycoon, players will start work on rockets. Each upgrade on their rocket will let them travel further and access more and more unique features.

Building up their base also lets players create portals, alien pets, and weaponry to fight against the various aliens. While one of the largest tycoons in terms of overall size, Rocket Tycoon is by far one of the most imaginative and best-looking maps.

Robot Tycoon

5824-9770-6508

  • Players: 4
  • Creator: s-k-a-v-i

Robot Tycoon lets fans do exactly what they'd expect to do from the title: Build robots. In Robot Tycoon, fans will start with the smallest of robots and start farming money to unlock better parts, generators, and larger robots.

There are four different robots that players can build: Optimus Prime, Iron Man, Bumblebee, and Bender. After choosing a robot, players can grow their robot in hopes that it becomes larger than other players' robots.

Mafia Tycoon

2367-8090-3663

  • Players: 4
  • Creator: smippyvlad

Although it is based on an odd concept, Mafia Tycoon is a very interesting tycoon game in Fortnite . It allows players to create their own underground mafia base and turn it into the best crime- and money-generating factory.

Players have to participate in heists, print money, get workers for their team in order to increase their money and crime income. As the numbers get higher and higher, they'll get access to better heist locations, allowing them to go on more dangerous missions like robbing a bank.

Pizza Tycoon

2642-3224-2641

  • Players: 4
  • Creator: zigazagzong

Building a base in Pizza Tycoon is the first goal of beginners in the Creative game, but eventually being able to produce more pizzas becomes the main goal. Once given a base to fix up, players will purchase pizza ovens to grant them more sales and currency over time.

Players can then upgrade their pizza ovens to produce more pizza, resulting in faster sales to grant them more money. Throughout the game, players will eventually have a large pizza factory, thousands of dollars, and enough weaponry to take out all the zombies across the map.

item.title: Battlefield 6 Beta Bug Is Breaking Players’ Aim
item.description:
A newly identified Battlefield 6 bug sneakily breaks players' aim after select slides by messing with the game's bloom algorithm. The issue has reportedly been present throughout the open beta period and now seems unlikely to be fixed before the end of the ongoing Battlefield 6 test.

Bloom—also called weapon spread or reticle bloom—is a gameplay mechanic in many modern shooters that introduces a degree of randomness to aiming. Rather than having bullets always strike precisely where the player aims, bloom makes projectile paths vary within a defined cone or differently-shaped area around the crosshair, depending on the exact implementation. The mechanic serves several functions: it discourages spray-and-pray automatic fire and creates an element of unpredictability that many developers argue adds to realism and helps with balancing. Battlefield games have long incorporated bloom in some shape or form, and the upcoming sixth numbered entry in the franchise continues this trend.

Battlefield 6 Beta Bug Breaks Bloom

An animation bug in the ongoing Battlefield 6 open beta has recently been discovered to cause persistent slide bloom, even if the player stops moving. The issue was initially spotted by popular streamer Shroud, prompting further investigation by YouTuber TheXclusiveAce (via Insider Gaming). According to the content creator's findings, having the sliding animation interrupted in any way can make the game mistakenly leave the player in the sliding bloom state, significantly—and sneakily—reducing their ability to aim.

Even Without a Slide Cancel, Battlefield 6 Slides Are Easy to Interrupt

Battlefield 6 movement mechanics do not include a traditional slide cancel, like the one from the recent Call of Duty games. Nevertheless, having one's slide interrupted is a semi-frequent occurrence, as simply colliding with uneven terrain or geometry will do the trick. The sliding animation can also be canceled by jumping, a technique that has gained popularity during the open beta for making players harder to hit. Because there is no visual indicator of the stuck sliding bloom state, most affected players are likely unaware of their aim being impaired.

How To Fix Stuck Sliding Bloom in Battlefield 6 Beta

Based on TheXclusiveAce's testing, the stuck sliding bloom state is semi-permanent. Specifically, it will persist after a canceled animation even if the player stands still or crouches. At the same time, it is reportedly possible to fix the issue by completing an uninterrupted slide, which will have the game apply the correct bloom state afterward.

The second Battlefield 6 open beta is scheduled to conclude in the early morning hours on Monday, August 18. With just over 24 hours remaining, the sliding bloom bug appears unlikely to be fixed before the test ends, though it will presumably be resolved by the time the game itself launches on October 10.

item.title: Pokemon GO: Dark Skies Event Guide
item.description:
Dark Skies is the definitive event of the Gygantamax Journey in Pokemon GO, featuring a massive spree of Dynamax Battles all across the world. Trainers need to prepare themselves for the arrival of Eternatus, and this event will help them hone their battle skills, as well as their Pokemon lineups to face this dangerous beast in the upcoming Pokemon GO: Fest event .

For those players who have everything set to participate in Dark Skies, and for those still making the final adjustments to their team, this guide provides a lot of useful information on the event, including schedule, available Dynamax Battles, Raids, bonuses, and Research.

Pokemon GO Dark Skies Bonuses, Date & Time

The Pokemon GO Dark Skies event will last from August 18, 2025, at 10 AM to Friday, August 23, 2025, at 10 AM Local Time. Players will have plenty of time to participate in featured Dynamax Battles, to capture every Gygantamax Pokemon that has been released until the date.

During this event, Dynamax Energy will be greatly boosted, with more Power Spots being active , with a daily refresh rate. On the other hand, the Max Particle collection limit will be increased while the event lasts. And finally, the daily limit for Raids will be increased to 30 . Next, trainers should take a look at the Dynamax Battle Schedule, to learn how and when these battles are being hosted.

Pokemon GO Dark Skies Dynamax Battles Schedule

Starting August 18, 2025 at 10 AM, Pokemon GO Dark Skies is hosting a series of Dynamax Battles to provide players with extra chances to complete their Dynamax Pokemon collection.

On Monday, August 18 , the following Dynamax Battles will be active:

  • Dynamax Beldum
  • Dynamax Caterpie
  • Dynamax Ghastly
  • Dynamax Krabby
  • Dynamax Shuckle
  • Dynamax Sableye
  • Dynamax Beldum
  • Dynamax Latias
  • Dynamax Latios
  • Dynamax Trubbish
  • Dynamax Sobble
  • Dynamax Hatenna

From all the previously mentioned Pokemon, only Sobble and Hatenna are Shiny Locked, the rest can be Shiny. Players will have yet another chance to catch Dynamax Latias and Latios during the first rounds of Dynamax Battles.

From August 19 to 20, these Dynamax Pokemon can appear in all gyms:

  • Dynamax Charmander
  • Dynamax Omanyte
  • Dynamax Kabuto
  • Dynamax Articuno
  • Dynamax Moltres
  • Dynamax Zapdos
  • Dynamax Pidove
  • Dynamax Drilbur
  • Dynamax Cryogonal
  • Dynamax Rookidee
  • Dynamax Toxtricity (both forms)
  • Dynamax Scorbunny

In this case, the only Shiny Locked Pokemon will be Scorbunny. The rest of the featured species can appear in their Shiny versions.

From August 21 to 22, the final rounds of Dynamax Battles will feature the following Pokemon:

  • Dynamax Bulbasaur
  • Dynamax Machop
  • Dynamax Chansey
  • Dynamax Raikou
  • Dynamax Suicune
  • Dynamax Entei
  • Dynamax Wailmer
  • Dynamax Darumaka
  • Dynamax Passimian
  • Dynamax Grookey
  • Dynamax Skwovet
  • Dynamax Woloo
  • Dynamax Falinks

All of the mentioned Pokemon from above, with the exception of Grookey can be encountered in their Shiny versions.

Pokemon GO Dark Skies All Raid Battles

Starting August 18 at 10 AM, Pokemon GO will also host another wave of Zacian and Zamazenta Raids. These Legendary Pokemon from the Galar region can be found in their Shiny versions, and the raids for both Pokemon will be available from August 18 to August 20, then for Zacian during August 21, and finally, Zamazenta 5-Star Raids will be held on August 22, 2025, to close the event.

Players should also take note that Crowned Zacian and Zamazenta, and their Shiny versions will be back on Special 5-Star Raids following the schedule detailed below:

  • Crowned Sword Zacian: Thursday, August 21, from 6 to 7 PM local time.
  • Crowned Shield Zamazenta: Friday, August 22, from 6 to 7 PM local time.

Pokemon GO Dark Skies Timed Research

A Timed Research focused on winning Max Battles will be available throughout the Dark Skies event in Pokemon GO. Players can complete the research tasks to earn rewards like Zacian Candy, Zamazenta Candy, and encounters with Grookey, Scorbunny, and Sobble.

The steps for the Timed Research will be available once the event starts, so be sure to check this guide for the updated information.

item.title: CRPGs With The Best Stories
item.description:
Summary

  • CRPGs offer isometric viewpoints and tactical combat with a focus on player commands.
  • Games like Pillars of Eternity offer epic adventures and rich narratives for fans to enjoy.
  • Titles like Baldur's Gate 3 and Planescape: Torment stand out for their complex stories and writing.

Computer role-playing games (CRPGs) may seem like a confusing name for this subgenre, but players will understand what CRPGs refer to after checking out a few titles that fall under this bracket. Most of these games have isometric viewpoints and tactical combat, where players select commands instead of carrying out actions in real-time.

Of course, it would be impossible to talk about CRPGs without mentioning the amazing stories that fans can experience in these titles. Players will love exploring these narratives and seeing the various ways they can role-play as the character of their choice.

Pillars Of Eternity

Incredible Worldbuilding And A Detailed Story To Uncover

Pillars of Eternity
7.3 /10
Released
March 26, 2015

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ due to Blood, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, Violence
Powered by

Obsidian Entertainment staged a comeback for the CRPG genre with the release of Pillars of Eternity . This title checked all the genre boxes when it came to letting players enjoy an epic adventure with numerous interesting and complex party members.

The narrative of Pillars of Eternity is great, which would've been a challenging endeavor given that this title was trying to establish an IP. The Dyrwood is a fascinating location to explore as players try to unravel the curse of the Hollowborn and figure out the secret that the gods are hiding, all while Thaos throws a wrench in their plans time and time again.

Tyranny

The Exploration Of Various Flavors Of Evil In This Game Is Incredible

6 Images
6 Images
Tyranny
9 /10
Released
November 10, 2016

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
t
Powered by

Tyranny is a game that could've been one of the best CRPGs ever made had it stuck the landing. However, that should take nothing away from a compelling journey where players control one of the evil tyrant Kyros' underlings who aid the overlord's quest to take over the world.

The best thing about Tyranny is its writing, allowing players to engage with various flavors of evil as they make progress in this riveting adventure. The fact that this game is set at the tail end of an invasion is great, making for a tantalizing environment that allows the game's rich plot to unfold organically.

Fallout 2

Established The Dark Humor Of The Series Along With Some Excellent Writing

Fallout 2
8.6 /10
Released
October 29, 1998

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ due to Blood and Gore, Strong Language
Powered by

Fallout 2 is one of the greatest role-playing games of all time. It was an important title for the series, integrating the iconic dark humor that Fallout games are known for today with the tactical combat seen in the series' debut entry.

It also features one of the most riveting gaming antagonists of all time in the form of Frank Horrigan, a super mutant clad in power armor who's a blast to engage with. This character, along with many other powerful storytelling moments in Fallout 2 , makes its narrative well worth experiencing for CRPG fans.

Dragon Age: Origins

A Legendary CRPG That Needs No Introduction

Dragon Age: Origins
9 /10
16
9.3 /10
Released
November 3, 2009

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood, Intense Violence, Language, Partial Nudity, Sexual Content
Powered by

Most people will be surprised to find that Dragon Age: Origins is a CRPG, but this should be clear after players check out how combat works. This game can technically be played in isometric view with a mouse, with players being encouraged to make the smartest moves in battles and use their abilities wisely.

It gives Dragon Age: Origins ' combat a tactical flair that is missing in the sequels. It also helps that the unique Origin system, coupled with a compelling central conflict, ensures that players will have a blast playing this incredible CRPG.

Baldur's Gate 3

An Ambitious Story Featuring A Ridiculous Number Of Branching Paths

Baldur's Gate 3
9 /10
140
9.7 /10
Released
August 3, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Partial Nudity, Sexual Content, Strong Language, Violence
Powered by

Baldur's Gate 3 is one of the best CRPGs of all time, with its narrative being just one of its many elements that fans can't get enough of. Players control either a custom or pre-defined character who has been infected with an illithid parasite and must figure out a way to combat their infection.

The role-playing complexity of Baldur's Gate 3 is immense, and the writing ensures that the game's narrative will be riveting from start to end, regardless of any choices the player makes. While the immense scope of this title means that the story may not always showcase the greatest pacing, it's more than competent otherwise.

Star Wars: Knights Of The Old Republic

Boasts One Of The Most Iconic Twists In Gaming History

Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
12
9.1 /10
Released
July 15, 2003

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T for Teen: Violence
Powered by

Knights of the Old Republic is hailed by many as one of the best Star Wars games ever made. It features a narrative so compelling that fans are still raving about its excellent central plot twist to this day.

Players control an amnesiac Jedi who must relearn their abilities before eventually facing off against powerful foes. As the game progresses, based on the player's choices, they can either become a righteous Jedi or a powerful Sith who makes everyone bend the knee.

Planescape: Torment

The Philosophical Narrative Turned This Game Into A CRPG Classic

Planescape: Torment
9.0 /10
Released
December 12, 1999

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
t
Powered by

Players who want to check out a CRPG with immaculate writing will love what Planescape: Torment brings to the table. The title is known for its philosophical writing, with the Nameless One slowly rediscovering his enemies as he interacts with people who seemingly remember him from his past.

The questions posed by this game are hard-hitting, and the mysteries surrounding the Nameless One are fun to uncover. All of this combines to let players enjoy a CRPG that has become legendary, mainly courtesy of its writing.

Disco Elysium

Boasts Incredible Storytelling In A Tantalizing World

Disco Elysium
9 /10
12
9.6 /10
Released
October 15, 2019

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ due to Blood, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, Use of Drugs, Violence
Powered by

From the moment players assume control of a drunk, amnesiac cop, they know they're in for something special in Disco Elysium . Players conduct a murder investigation in Martinaise that takes them on a wild goose chase full of eccentric personalities to interact with and a wide variety of political beliefs to embrace, defame, or bastardize.

From cryptid hunts to karaoke and everything in between, Disco Elysium is full of small moments that make it extremely special. Despite the game lacking almost any form of combat, the writing is so strong that players will be captivated regardless.
